sqlMap.select:
select sort_column, owner, syskd, scd, scdnm, priv, usrid, pswd, usrnm, idno, email, tel, mobile, addr, status, lstlgndt, lstlgntm, pswdcnt, use_flag, vip_type, lawoffice, ok_id, group_id, lawofficeadmincnt from(
select '1' as sort_column, 'SO' as owner, '' as sys, '' as syskd, '' as scd, '' as scdnm, priv, usrid, pswd, usrnm, idno, email, tel, mobile, addr, status, lstlgndt, lstlgntm, pswdcnt, 'N' as use_flag, vip_type, lawoffice, '' as ok_id, '' as group_id, (select count(1) from so..s03 (nolock) where lawoffice=a.lawoffice and vip_type='L') as lawofficeadmincnt from so..s03 a with (nolock) where usrid = #usrid# and status = 'Y'
pswd = #pswd#
union
select '2' as sort_column, 'BOS' as owner, 'A' as sys, a.syskd, a.scd, b.clnm as scdnm, a.priv, a.usrid, a.pswd, a.usrnm, a.idno, a.email, a.tel, a.mobile, a.addr, a.status, a.lstlgndt, a.lstlgntm, a.pswdcnt, a.use_flag, '' as vip_type, '' as lawoffice, ok_id, group_id, '0' as lawofficeadmincnt from bos..s03 a with (nolock) left join bos..s61 b with (nolock) on b.syskd = a.syskd and b.scd = a.scd where a.usrid = #usrid# and a.status = 'Y' and a.syskd in ('J', 'I', 'T') and a.priv = 'U'
a.pswd = #pswd#
) sqltable order by sort_column
